text: Pas holi in gumrohon ci guna xohad ʙud, vaqte ki ʙa saʙaʙi gunohone, ki ʙo dasti xud ancom dodand va in ki toƣutro hokim qaror dodand, ʙa musiʙat va ʙaloe giriftor savand?! Sipas pesi tu meojand va ʙaroi kore, ki ancom dodaand, uzr meorand va ʙa Alloh savgand mexurand, ki maqsadi xajrxohi va osti dodani du taraf dostand, dar hole ki onon duruƣ megujand
